title: Episode #62: Wittes and Friedersdorf Debate the Ethics of Drones
itunes:title: Episode #62: Wittes and Friedersdorf Debate the Ethics of Drones
itunes:subtitle: Conor Friedersdorf and Benjamin Wittes debate the ethics of drone warfare at the University of Richmond in November 2013.
description:
Conor Friedersdorf and Benjamin Wittes debate the ethics of drone warfare at the University of Richmond in November 2013.
